Reviews.Title: Not the best
Reviews.Author: Sallie E. Henshaw "Hallie S"
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone to replace a broken one for cheaper. Works fine, but the keyboard is very small and it can be annoying.

Reviews.Title: Worked for a while then went offline
Reviews.Author: angela v
Reviews.Content: Phone worked for about a month to two months, then failed to stay online.  Took it to Verizon and they could not get it back online.  Very frustrating, looked good, reset date to 2010 also.  I dont know what went wrong very upset that I am out 100 dollars and a phone that does not work.
